titles.title: Improving Access to Remote Behavioral Health Treatment Act of 2018

bill.summary:
Improving Access to Remote Behavioral Health Treatment Act of 2018
This bill amends the Controlled Substances Act to direct the Drug Enforcement Administration to register certain community mental health centers to administer controlled substances via telemedicine.
